show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content: Mickey Huff and and guest host Nolan Higdon interview Sarah van Gelder of Yes Magazine regarding notable victories on... <!--more--> the social justice front in 2014, and recounts of some the year’s “good news” stories.  Then media scholar Robin Andersen looks at the uproar over the movie “The Interview,” and the computer hacking at Sony; Andersen reveals the close relationships between Hollywood and the Pentagon, past and present.
